Tl:dr; SJW bullshit again.

*prepares to dodge shoes*
I'm going to disagree with EQD, but I do think it was right to let him go because you shouldn't allow people's political ideologies slip into children's comic books and even though it wasn't that big of a deal with him adding the sjw member's oc to the canon it was still inappropriate to do so in that political ideology should remain out of children's comics.

So I have been readin excepts of Marx.
Terrible writer but he describes the bourgeoisie as innkeepers, landlords etc...
Not as the nobles or elites really.
So he, and all who use his ideas, really just hate the middle class right?

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545d7b36636872433f3e0200#post_545d7b36636872433f3e0200
You should read him in german, thats how he really shines. For starters I wouldnt recommend reading only excerpts. And no, the nobility isnt considered a productive class, theregore they arent burguois. 
The burguois rarely stays as middle class much rime, they ascend socially through "plusval√≠a" sorry I dont know the term in english. I wouldnt say he hates the middle class but he certainly considers it an obstacle to revolution since they think of themselves as a higher class while they arent, therefore assuming the counterrevolutionary attittude of them while being exploited like the proletariat. They are in a class limbo.
